ovdesc.p: This screen is used to repair or cancel a payment that is parked due to any technical error. A payment that encounters any technical error ( Fatal Error) will be parked at parked payment queue with status that is in process. The payment cannot be considered for further process by any subflow as the status will be set as in-process. Such kinds of payments can either be moved to repair or cancel status using this screen.
Repair will move the payment to repair status (235) and Cancel will move to an end status canceled (997).
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend records in store tables, POR.PAYMENTSTATUSCODE and POR.TRANSACTION.
